body:
I thought about overriding the delete method for this, but I went with a cancel method to better represent the semantics of what is going on. Maybe Moving all the signature handling to a save and delete method, and keeping the semantics methods (but without that logic) would be better.

I'm not sure how we would do this with signals. I haven't worked with them a lot. What did you have in mind?
